bwg.wikipedia_tasks module¶

Module contents¶

NLP Pipeline tasks for french texts.

Bases: luigi.task.Task, bwg.mixins.ArticleProcessingMixin, bwg.wikidata.WikidataAPIMixin

class bwg.wikipedia_tasks.RequestCache¶

Bases: object

Special class used as a Cache, so that requests being made don’t have to be repeated if they occurred in the past.

request(key, request_func, *request_args, **request_kwargs)¶

Make a request, but make a lookup to the cache first to see if you may be able to avoid it.

Parameters:
  • key (str, int) – Key that should be used to cache the request.
  • request_func (func) – Function to do the request.
  • request_args (tuple) – Arguments for request.
  • request_kwargs (dict) – Key word arguments for request.

Bases: luigi.task.Task

A luigi task that reads an extracted Wikipedia corpus (see README).
